original_text: And the name of the third river is the Tigris, which flows east of Assyria. And the fourth river is the Euphrates.
korean_text: 셋째 강의 이름은 힛데겔이라 앗수르 동쪽으로 흘렀으며 넷째 강은 유브라데더라

sentences.original_text: And the name of the third river is the Tigris
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 세 번째 강의 이름은 티그리스강입니다.

sentences.original_text: And the fourth river is the Euphrates
